OL.LI:
Platforms in active development. We currently develop and/or deploy live material on these platforms:
Solaris SPARC 2.6 or higher
Red Hat Linux Intel 7.2 or higher

Platforms with historical support. We maintain an XPAT build environment for these platform, and make every effort to ensure portable middleware, but do not actually deploy live material on these platforms:
IBM AIX PowerPC 3.2 or higher
root access (to change aspects of the environment, e.g., directory and file permissions)
The following Perl modules (where versions are given, DLXS requires that version or higher):
DBD::mysql 2.1017 (required only if you plan to use MySQL as your database server)
A web server that supports Apache sessions. We recommend Apache 1.3.26 or higher.

For page image viewing
c42pdf for displaying TIFF images in PDF format (free)
tif2web for displaying TIFF images in GIF and/or PNG format (free)

For MrSID-compressed continuous tone image viewing
a MrSID encoding product such as MrSIDGeo that supports batch encoding of images (not free)
mrsid_retrieve for displaying MrSID-encoded images in JPEG format (free)

DIV1.P: We appreciate hearing from you if you encounter other system requirements. Please contact the author for additions and suggestions.
